page.title: 09The Village Postmaster.
page.content: Mr.Lord owns the only Post Office in our area. He opens at 9.00am and closes at 12.00 noon for lunch, then re-opens at 2.00pm and closes for the night at 5.30pm. Unlike most places his half day closing is on Tuesday . His Post Office is nearly opposite the pub.They bought the Post Office in 1971. The other things on sale include confectionary, groceries, sweets, ice creams and some shoes and clothing. We thought it might be difficult for him to get enough time for a holiday so we asked him, " How do you arange your holidays? " and he said, " Well, we have to arange our holidays when we can get someone to act as relief for us." We don't think he gets many holidays.
